name: ynt
description: Keep YouTube content in its original language: titles, descriptions, audio... No more unwanted translations.

scripts.create-dirs: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/content dist/background dist/styles dist/assets/icons
scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:content && npm run bundle:background && npm run bundle:popup && npm run bundle:scripts
scripts.build: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chromium
scripts.build:firefox: npm run check:types && npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:firefox && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:firefox-old: npm run check:types && npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:firefox-old && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:chromium: npm run check:types && npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:chromium && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:safari: npm run check:types && npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:safari && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:common: npm run build:polyfill && npm run bundle:all && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run post:build
scripts.build:html: cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp src/popup/settings.html dist/popup/ && cp src/content/SupportToast/toast.html dist/content/
scripts.pre:web-ext:firefox: cp manifests/manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && npm run sync-package-fields-to-manifest
scripts.pre:web-ext:firefox-old: cp manifests/manifest.firefox.old.json manifest.json && npm run sync-package-fields-to-manifest
scripts.pre:web-ext:chromium: cp manifests/manifest.chromium.json manifest.json && npm run sync-package-fields-to-manifest
scripts.pre:web-ext:safari: cp manifests/manifest.safari.json manifest.json && npm run sync-package-fields-to-manifest
scripts.package:all: npm run package:firefox && npm run source:mozilla && npm run package:chromium
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && rm -rf build-tmp && mkdir build-tmp && cp -r dist build-tmp/ && cp LICENSE build-tmp/ && cp CHANGELOG.md build-tmp/ && cp manifest.json build-tmp/ && (cd build-tmp && web-ext build --overwrite-dest -a ../web-ext-artifacts/firefox --filename=firefox-ynt-${npm_package_version}.zip) && rm -rf build-tmp && npm run clean
scripts.package:firefox-old: npm run build:firefox-old && rm -rf build-tmp && mkdir build-tmp && cp -r dist build-tmp/ && cp LICENSE build-tmp/ && cp CHANGELOG.md build-tmp/ && cp manifest.json build-tmp/ && (cd build-tmp && web-ext build --overwrite-dest -a ../web-ext-artifacts/firefox --filename=firefox-ynt-${npm_package_version}.zip) && rm -rf build-tmp && npm run clean
scripts.package:chromium: npm run build:chromium && rm -rf build-tmp && mkdir build-tmp && cp -r dist build-tmp/ && cp LICENSE build-tmp/ && cp CHANGELOG.md build-tmp/ && cp manifest.json build-tmp/ && (cd build-tmp && web-ext build --overwrite-dest -a ../web-ext-artifacts/chromium --filename=chromium-ynt-${npm_package_version}.zip) && rm -rf build-tmp && npm run clean
scripts.prepare:safari: npm run build:safari && npm run copy:safari && npm run setup:safari
scripts.copy:safari: rm -rf safari/YouTube\ No\ Translation/YouTube\ No\ Translation/Resources/dist && cp -r dist safari/YouTube\ No\ Translation/YouTube\ No\ Translation/Resources/

author: YouGo
